titleStmt.title: Verses set forth by Henry Faulconer bell-man and presented to his worthy masters in the vvard of Farrington Within.
titleStmt.author: Faulconer, Henry.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "When sun from sky is fled, and don't appear ..."
Imperfect: cropped at head with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
